name: mirror of immortality
description:
There is a kind of legend in the ancient East.

They often haunt mountains far away from human society, but they don't drink blood at all.

"Thousands of paths are lost, and thousands of mountains are lost."

This is a sentence to describe the silent wilderness after the heavy snow. But it confirms the world they exist at the moment.

You will take risks in a strange world, but everything here is not far away for you.

You pick those nearly extinct spiritual flowers and herbs and tell them to make pills.

Follow the ancient beast and fight.

Haunt among the very ancient ruins, searching for the memories that have passed away in the long river of history.

Discover the laws of things, accumulate experience from the world, and gradually predict.

Know how to move from the present to the future, and know more about peeping into the past from the future.

Everything in the process is pointing your life to the legendary name - immortal.



You will come to an oriental fantasy world. In order to live in the cruel nature of competition, you need to learn new technologies and constantly improve your ability.

Levels, skills, pills, weapons and equipment are indispensable.

All the secrets about the world seem to be hidden in a mirror.
